meanings.sent1: The truncation of the rope made it too short to reach the ground.
meanings.sent2: I had to use truncation to make the essay fit the word limit.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved a sudden truncation of the rope, leaving the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: The truncation of the tree branches created a stark silhouette against the sky.
meanings.sent5: The truncation of the conversation left us with unanswered questions.

meanings.sent1: The truncation of the movie removed the boring scenes.
meanings.sent2: In data analysis, truncation helps in focusing on specific information.
